mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (`player_id`)) dau FROM `log_account` WHERE `create_date` = #{getTime} AND `type` = 2
SELECT DISTINCT(l.`server_id`) FROM `log_account` l WHERE l.`create_date` = DATE(#{countDate})
SELECT DISTINCT(l.`server_id`) FROM `log_account` l WHERE l.`create_date` >= DATE(#{startDate}) AND l.`create_date` <= DATE(#{endDate})

SELECT IFNULL(sum(o.`pay_amount`), 0) AS payAmount FROM `game_order` o LEFT JOIN `game_player` p ON o.`player_id` = p.`player_id` WHERE p.`create_date` = DATE(#{date}) AND o.`create_date` = DATE(#{date}) AND p.`channel` = #{channel} AND p.`server_id` = #{serverId}

SELECT count(DISTINCT o.`player_id`) AS payAmount FROM `game_order` o JOIN `game_player` p ON o.`player_id` = p.`player_id` WHERE p.`create_date` = DATE(#{date}) AND o.`create_date` = DATE(#{date}) AND p.`channel` = #{channel} AND p.`server_id` = #{serverId}

SELECT l.`player_id` FROM `log_account` l LEFT JOIN (SELECT `player_id` FROM `log_account` WHERE `type` = 2 AND `server_id` = #{serverId} AND `create_date` >= DATE(#{startDate}) AND `create_date` <= DATE(#{endDate}) GROUP BY `player_id`) t ON t.`player_id` = l.`player_id` WHERE l.`type` = 2 AND l.`server_id` = #{serverId} AND t.`player_id` IS NULL GROUP BY l.`player_id`;
